newsitem.title: USA: Aronex gets $2 mln advance from Genzyme.
newsitem.headline: Aronex gets $2 mln advance from Genzyme.

text.p: Aronex Pharmaceuticals Inc said Thursday it had received a $2.0 million advance to a $5 million equity milestone investment from Genzyme Corp.
Aronez said the payment derives from a 1993 agreement with Genzyme to develop an anti-cancer agent called TretinoinLF.
"We intend to use the funds to progress our Phase II clinical trials in APL and the Phase II/III trials for Kaposi's sarcoma in collaboration with Genzyme," it said.
Aronez said it would get the other $3 million if the two companies go ahead with a pivotal Phase III clinical trial of TretinoinLF for Kaposi's sarcoma.
If the milestone is not achieved within one year of the advance, Aronex said it would repay the amount of the advance less certain development expenses.
